name: All-Nighter (DumbLuckInteractive)
description:
An Inspector receives an unexpected invitation to attend a gala at a museum. After spending time observing the arts and talking with the other attendees, things take a turn... can you solve the mystery at the gala, and save everyone?

This game was made as a part of Lone Rabbit's " a jam about time."

CONTROLS:

WASD to move

E to interact

Credits:

Programming: Ellie Gargiulo, Anthony Mendez

3D Environment Artist: Miles Cumiskey 

3D Modeler: Evan Bianco, Miles Cumiskey

2D Artist: Julie Antonello

Story and Narrative: Nina Navazio, Anthony Mendez, Evan Bianco

Music and Sound Effects: Meaghanne McBride

KNOWN BUGS:

- Entering either of the two side hallways between 7-9pm may cause a softlock.

- If you find the game devoid of other characters at the start (7:00) increment the time using the bottom left (7:20)
